sentences.sContent: Yet this we ask ere you leave us, that you speak to us and give us of your truth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet this we ask ere you leave us, that you speak to us and give us of your truth.
sentences.sCn: 然而在你离开我们之前，对我们说话，把你的真理传述给我们。

sentences.sContent: Yet, if death be in this cup, I bid thee think again, ere thou beholdest me quaff it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet, if death be in this cup, I bid thee think again, ere thou beholdest me quaff it.
sentences.sCn: 不过，要是这杯药可以致我于死地，在你眼看着我一口吞下去之前，我请求你再想一想。
